name: Kasuri Gosht Kabab Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Kasuri Gosht Kabab Recipe: Mutton boneless 1 kg small cubes Ginger garlic pate 3 tbsp White vinegar 3 tbsp Chili powder 2 tbsp Black pepper powder 1 tsp Salt 1½ tsp Cream 3 tbsp Cheddar cheese 3 tbsp grated All spice 1 tsp heaped Cumin powder 1 tsp heaped Saffron ¼ tsp Kasuri methi 1 tsp Chopped coriander leaves 2 tbsp
instructions: Wash mutton cut into 2 inch cubes Marinate with all the given ingredients for 1 hour. Put meat on skewers and roast in a pre-heated oven or BBQ brushing with oil Serve garnish with line lemon wedges.
